item.title: interpret of Tracktype and Surface
item.description:
From cadfael1974 on November 21, 2011 09:50:04
I wish an enhancement to view Tracktypes like in OSMand. Need it for my system and to update OSM - Data's!
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=207

item.contents:
From cadfael1974 on November 21, 2011 10:36:27
mmm,for example, look at: http://www.openstreetmap.org/?lat=52.426&lon=9.67739&zoom=17&layers=M It's Mecklenheide Forst (Forest)
There are some Way's with the Key's:
highway: track tracktype: Grade 2
if tracktype in the key's so there must interpreted from grade 1 - 5 http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:tracktype if the way's drawn like Mapnick - it's perfect ;-)
PS: Sorry for my bad english :-(

From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on December 04, 2011 06:19:29
I have added the tags to the default mapping XML file with revision r1551 , now we only need to add rules to our default render theme.
Status: Started

From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on January 07, 2012 07:39:44
I have added the necessary rules to the (default) osmarender theme with revision r1693 , so these way types should be rendered correctly now.
Status: Fixed
